data.title: Crown 20M Walk-Behind Electric Stackers
data.meta-description: Used Crown 20M Walk-Behind Electric Stackers in stock at American Surplus. Nationwide shipping available!

ul.li: Capable of lifting 2,000 lb. loads up to 57" in the air
More maneuverable than a standard lift truck
12V Battery and Used 12V Battery Charger included with purchase!

long-description.p: Used Crown 20M Walk-Behind Electric Stackers are now in stock at American Surplus! This powerful electric stacker is designed with maneuverability in mind -- with controls and a profile similar to that of an Electric Pallet Jack! However, where pallet jacks and stackers differ is in lift height; While an electric pallet jack (such as the Crown WP-2335) may only offer up to 6" of lift height, a Crown 20M Electric Stacker provides up to 57"! With a significantly increased lift height, your staff can efficiently stack pallets and even place product on lower racks while still using the same pallet jack workflow they're comfortable with. Call our sales team at (800) 876-3736 today to speak with our experienced sales team about adding Crown M20 Walk-Behind Electric Stackers to your fleet today!
